thread.title: Penguins hoping more depth behind stars leads to deeper run
thread.title_full: Penguins hoping more depth behind stars leads to deeper run

title: Penguins hoping more depth behind stars leads to deeper run
text:
> Pennsylvania Penguins hoping more depth behind stars leads to deeper run Pittsburgh Penguins' Sidney Crosby (87) controls the puck again Carolina Hurricanes' Justin Faulk (27) during the first period of an NHL preseason hockey game in Raleigh, N.C., Friday, Oct. 2, 2015.
